languages.text: {n}Скрипя зубами, сенешаль выдавливает:{/n} "Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус приветствует тебя, почтенный техножрец, и милостиво дозволяет пребывать в е{mf|го|е} обществе".
{n}Clenching his teeth, the Seneschal grits out,{/n} "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius greets you, honoured Tech-Priest, and graciously grants you permission to remain in {mf|his|her} presence."
languages.original_text: {n}Скрипя зубами, сенешаль выдавливает:{/n} "Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус приветствует тебя, почтенный техножрец, и милостиво дозволяет пребывать в е{mf|го|е} обществе".

traits.locale_text: {n}Clenching his teeth, the Seneschal grits out,{/n} "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius greets you, honoured Tech-Priest, and graciously grants you permission to remain in {mf|his|her} presence."

{n}Clenching his teeth, the Seneschal grits out,{/n} "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius greets you, honoured Tech-Priest, and graciously grants you permission to remain in {mf|his|her} presence."
{n}Clenching his teeth, the Seneschal grits out,{/n} "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius greets you, honoured Tech-Priest, and graciously grants you permission to remain in {mf|his|her} presence."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德咬紧了牙，清了清嗓子。{/n}“尊敬的技术神甫，行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯向你致意，允许你出现在{mf|他|她}的面前。”
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his teeth, the Seneschal grits out,{/n} "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius greets you, honoured Tech-Priest, and graciously grants you permission to remain in {mf|his|her} presence."

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的技术祭司，行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯向你致意，允许你出现在{mf|他|她}的面前。”

languages.text: {n}Apretando los dientes, el Senescal masculla:{/n} «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius le saluda, honorable tecnosacerdote, y le concede un permiso magnánimo para permanecer ante su presencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his teeth, the Seneschal grits out,{/n} "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius greets you, honoured Tech-Priest, and graciously grants you permission to remain in {mf|his|her} presence."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius le saluda, honorable tecnosacerdote, y le concede un permiso magnánimo para permanecer ante su presencia».

languages.text: {n}歯を食いしばりつつ、家令長はこう言った。「{/n}自由開拓者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスがご挨拶申し上げます、名誉ある技術司祭よ。幸運なことに、あなたは陛下のお側にいることを許されたのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his teeth, the Seneschal grits out,{/n} "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius greets you, honoured Tech-Priest, and graciously grants you permission to remain in {mf|his|her} presence."

traits.locale_text: 「{n}歯を食いしばるように家令長は、こう言った。{/n}自由開拓者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスがご挨拶に伺いました、名誉ある技術司祭よ。ありがたいことに、あなたは陛下のお側にいることを許されたのです」

languages.text: {n}Le sénéchal siffle entre ses dents serrées :{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius vous salue, honorable technoprêtre, et vous autorise gracieusement à rester en sa présence. »
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his teeth, the Seneschal grits out,{/n} "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius greets you, honoured Tech-Priest, and graciously grants you permission to remain in {mf|his|her} presence."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius vous salue, honorable technoprêtre, et vous autorise gracieusement à rester en sa présence. »

languages.text: {n}Der Truchsess presst aus zusammengebissenen Zähnen hervor:{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius grüßt Euch, vereherter Techpriester, und gewährt Euch gnädig die Erlaubnis, in {mf|seiner|ihrer} Anwesenheit zu verweilen."
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his teeth, the Seneschal grits out,{/n} "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius greets you, honoured Tech-Priest, and graciously grants you permission to remain in {mf|his|her} presence."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius grüßt Euch, verehrter Techpriester, und gestattet Euch großzügig die Anwesenheit in {mf|seiner|ihrer} Nähe."

languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his teeth, the Seneschal grits out,{/n} "Rogue Trader  von Valancius greets you, honoured Tech-Priest, and graciously grants you permission to remain in {mf|his|her} presence."

languages.text: {n}Seneşal sıktığı dişleri arasından konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Şerefli Tekno Rahip, Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius seni selamlıyor ve lütufkârlığıyla onun huzurunda kalmana müsaade ediyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his teeth, the Seneschal grits out,{/n} "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius greets you, honoured Tech-Priest, and graciously grants you permission to remain in {mf|his|her} presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seneşal sıktığı dişleri arasından konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Haydut Tüccar {name} von Valancius seni selamlıyor şerefli Tekno Rahip ve lütufkârlığıyla onun huzurunda kalmana izin veriyor."
